EmailTemplate.subject: Great Prices on Printers & Organization Solutions

Get a $25 Vanilla Prepaid Mastercard when you spend $75 on qualifying Avery products** UP TO 60% OFF <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/File-Storage-Boxes-Drawers-Cases/_/N-1z0czraZal4?showMoreIds=58?cmp=EBPRELOGINJANPROMO20EN4&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>

Select HP, Lexmark & Xerox Printers Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Deal Centre Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**To qualify for the $25 CAD mail-in rebate, you must purchase a minimum of $75 CAD before tax of the qualifying products listed between January 1, 2020 – June 30th, 2020. To redeem the offer, go to www.averypromotions.ca and follow the on-screen redemption instructions. To be eligible, your claim must be accompanied by the original product package UPC(s) and original sales receipt(s)/Invoice related to the qualifying purchase. Online claims (including all Documentation) must be received through the Avery website by July 17, 2020. If you are mailing-in your claim and documentation, it must be postmarked by July 17, 2020 and received by no later than July 31, 2020. Mail-in claim must include the redemption key provided after basic information has been entered on www.averypromotions.ca. †Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Offer valid while supplies last. Excludes tax. © 2020 Grand & Toy Limited ${customBodyHtml1}
